      • decryptAuthenticate

        public byte[] decryptAuthenticate(byte[] Header,
                         byte[] Ciphertext,
                         byte[] Tag,
                         int Blocksize,
                         org.bouncycastle.crypto.BlockCipher Cipher,
                         byte[] Key)
        Decrypts a Message using McOE-X.
        Specified by:
        decryptAuthenticate in class McOE
        Parameters:
        Header - the Header
        Ciphertext - the Ciphertext
        Tag - the Tag, it must be exactly from half of the length of Blocksize
        Blocksize - the Blocksize in Bits
        Cipher - the used BlockCipher e.g. AES
        Key - the key as byte array
        Returns:
        the plaintext or null if the tag was not valid
